trans-unit.source: Redirect rule, use {local}, {domain}, {tld} and Fluid ViewHelpers to construct dynamic addresses.: Example "mailtest+{local}@{domain}.{tld} or mailtest+{local}-{domain}-{tld}@yourdomain.org"
Tester IP, configured like devIPmask, set to * to match all
User-Agent to match. Set to * for all, e.g. if test-browser can't change the UA.: Example "Codeception Mail Test"
Whitelisted recipient adresses won't be redirected. Comparison is done with php function fnmatch
Subject template, use {subject}Â for the original subject
